name: Small Issue
description: Our sex life just isn't doing it for me anymore.   To be perfectly frank your small little cock just doesn't bring me to the type of orgasm a woman like me deserves.  I'm tired of faking it and I had to let you know so we could discuss some options."  It was just like my lawyer wife to propose an analytical approach to a problem. I cant stay  like this with you but if you stay it will be on my terms. What's your decision my little sissy.  Do you want to stay or go."
